data.title: Best Episodes of American Dad! (Interactive Rating Graph)
data.meta_description: The ratings of every American Dad! episode in an interactive graph. Quickly find the best American Dad! episodes or see how episode ratings trend over time.
data.meta_site_name: Episode Ratings - Interactive Rating Graph & Episode Guide
data.text:
Klaus and Rogu in "Thank God for Loose Rocks": An American Dad! Adventure

S 18 Ep 5

6.8

17th May 2021

When the family goes to a dude ranch, Klaus and Rogu have to work together to survive in the wilderness.

Cry Baby

S 18 Ep 20

6.8

30th Aug 2021

When Stan realizes he can't cry, he asks Steve to teach him empathy.

You Are Here

S 19 Ep 15

6.8

31st Oct 2022

Roger and Steve try to save a dying mall.

Hot Scoomp

S 18 Ep 11

6.8

28th Jun 2021

Hayley searches for guidance and instead finds a community of 'cool butts.'

Epic Powder Dump

S 19 Ep 5

6.8

21st Feb 2022

Stan insists everyone help him recreate the rustic family ski trips of his childhood while Klaus falls in love with a tech support operator.

Stan Fixes a Shingle

S 20 Ep 8

6.9

22nd May 2023

Francine insists that Steve let her help with his school project, Stan finally fixes that shingle, and the rest of the family goes on a quest to return Gallagher's mallet.

Cow I Met Your Moo-ther

S 20 Ep 7

6.9

15th May 2023

The judgmental voice in Hayley's head makes it impossible for her to enjoy a girls' night with Nerfer and Danuta.

Comb Over: A Hair Piece

S 18 Ep 15

6.9

26th Jul 2021

Stan finally decides to do something about his secret baldness and enlists the help of Josay Bosay, Roger's famed hair-stylist-to-the-stars persona.

Tapped Out

S 17 Ep 5

6.9

11th May 2020

Steve discovers his mom has never stopped giving him her breastmilk.

Flush After Reading

S 18 Ep 14

6.9

19th Jul 2021

Francine and Roger get lost in a good book -- or five -- after Francine escapes an embarrassing situation; Stan reluctantly hangs out at the library.

Family Time

S 18 Ep 19

6.9

23rd Aug 2021

Stan and the family go out to dinner at a buffet restaurant. Roger becomes a flower.

Shakedown Steve

S 18 Ep 4

6.9

10th May 2021

Steve and Jeff try to bond as brothers while the rest of the family visits an escape room.

Viced Principal

S 20 Ep 3

6.9

10th Apr 2023

Steve and Principal Lewis get caught in a dangerous situation at the school. The rest of the family makes an adorable new friend.

A League of His Own

S 19 Ep 14

6.9

10th Oct 2022

Steve profiles Stan for an essay contest at school; Francine uses a porta john.

Gernot and Strudel

S 19 Ep 20

6.9

5th Dec 2022

Hoping to teach him the value of sharing, the family recreates a television show from Klaus's childhood. Roger has a piano recital.

Gold Top Nuts

S 19 Ep 10

6.9

12th Sep 2022

The Smiths return from a difficult, quarrelsome vacation, but they can't get a break from one another.

American Dad Graffito

S 19 Ep 6

6.9

28th Feb 2022

To save a beloved restaurant from closing, Stan must bring the 1950s back to Langley.

The Grounch

S 19 Ep 22

7.0

19th Dec 2022

When Roger has his famous Christmas sex party stolen from him the results are... monstrous. Stan creates a magazine for men.

The Three Fs

S 19 Ep 11

7.0

19th Sep 2022

Francine's newfound friendship with a frog brings excitement to the whole Smith household. Unfortunately, it drives their neighbor, Greg, crazy.

Langley Dollar Listings

S 19 Ep 1

7.0

24th Jan 2022

Francine becomes a realtor in Langley's world of high-end real estate, while the rest of the family sells coffee from the front yard.

The Chilly Thrillies

S 17 Ep 20

7.0

24th Aug 2020

Francine explores ASMR with Roger. Steve gets a a pole in his head and a secret admirer.

Crystal Clear

S 18 Ep 21

7.0

6th Sep 2021

Stan gets in over his head trying to impress Toshi's dad; Klaus and Jeff head to the country for a weekend getaway.

Salute Your Sllort

S 17 Ep 13

7.0

6th Jul 2020

Steve's efforts to befriend a Swedish exchange student backfire in a big way; The family calls in an animal behaviorist to deal with Klaus.

Dammmm, Stan!

S 17 Ep 21

7.0

31st Aug 2020

Stan goes to great lengths to find the "right" couple's activity for him and Francine; Hayley and Steve look into some mysterious markings they find on the door frame.

Plot Heavy

S 18 Ep 16

7.0

2nd Aug 2021

After Stan sells off the coveted family plot, the family opens their own cemetery in the backyard with the help of basketball Hall-of-Famer Scottie Pippen.

Beyond the Alcove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Klaus

S 19 Ep 7

7.0

7th Mar 2022

Francine is jealous of the new and improved Klaus and vows to take him down.

A Roger Story

S 19 Ep 4

7.0

14th Feb 2022

Steve and Snot's friendship gets put to the test when their mothers start to fight.

OreTron Trail

S 15 Ep 12

7.0

30th Apr 2018

Roger becomes worried about outliving the family; Klaus opens a convenience store in the attic.

The Last Ride of the Dodge City Rambler

S 17 Ep 22

7.0

7th Sep 2020

The Smiths take a trip on an old steam locomotive to visit Francine's aunt only to discover it's being hijacked.

Dr. Sunderson's SunSuckers

S 18 Ep 18

7.0

16th Aug 2021

Hayley and Jeff help one of Roger's personas run a solar company.

Better on Paper

S 20 Ep 6

7.0

8th May 2023

When Stan discovers anonymous love letters written to Francine, he worries that this secret admirer could threaten their relationship.

Stretched Thin

S 20 Ep 5

7.0

1st May 2023

When Jeff finds out that the family thinks he makes terrible decisions, he decides to take a job selling stretchy leggings to prove them wrong.

Dressed Down

S 19 Ep 2

7.0

31st Jan 2022

When Stan doesn't feel confident in anything but his suits, Roger assumes a fashion designer persona to craft him a life-changing new wardrobe. Hayley and Jeff raise chickens in the back yard.

Stan Moves to Chicago

S 18 Ep 3

7.1

3rd May 2021

Stan moves to Chicago to become a comic while Steve and Hayley host Roger for a nice night in.

The Sinister Fate!!

S 18 Ep 17

7.1

9th Aug 2021

A new friendship causes Hayley to start worrying she might be slowly turning into Francine. Steve and his friends try out for Roger's improv troupe.

A New Era for the Smith House

S 20 Ep 16

7.1

6th Nov 2023

Klaus house sits for the Smiths while they are away on vacation. Roger investigates the origin of powerful winds plaguing the Eastern Seaboard.

Trophy Wife, Trophy Life

S 17 Ep 10

7.1

15th Jun 2020

After Stan is injured, Francine nurses him back to health and he becomes dependent to her. The family discovers Tuttle is a Korean reality show star.

The Pleasanting at Smith House

S 20 Ep 4

7.1

17th Apr 2023

Klaus and Jeff's friendship is threatened by Klaus's girlfriend from another realm.

Echoes

S 19 Ep 21

7.1

12th Dec 2022

Steve starts a work-study program and discovers that not all is what it seems at Channel 3 News. Roger seeks redemption in the Nashville country music scene.

Russian Doll

S 18 Ep 2

7.1

26th Apr 2021

Stan becomes infatuated with a doll that the CIA wants to use to spy on the Russians.

Jambalaya

S 19 Ep 19

7.1

28th Nov 2022

When Francine successfully grows a garden, it reminds Roger he knows a recipe for truly authentic jambalaya.

Cheek to Cheek: A Stripper's Story

S 17 Ep 3

7.1

27th Apr 2020

Roger enlists Jeff as his protégé in order to open his dream strip club; Klaus moves into Steve’s room.

American Data?

S 17 Ep 12

7.1

29th Jun 2020

Steve and the boys take part in a prison experiment to earn some cash. Meanwhile, Stan deals with the death of his CIA groundskeeper friend.

One Fish, Two Fish

S 17 Ep 8

7.1

1st Jun 2020

Hayley takes extreme measures to help Klaus from being deported while the rest of the family tries to open a coconut.

Henderson

S 18 Ep 10

7.1

21st Jun 2021

Stan's childhood imaginary friend returns to collect a debt. Klaus has a big date and needs a fishbowl upgrade.

Mused and Abused

S 18 Ep 9

7.1

14th Jun 2021

Roger reveals a secret passion to Klaus; Stan and Francine seek revenge on Bazooka Sharks management.

Stan & Francine & Stan & Francine & Radika

S 18 Ep 13

7.1

12th Jul 2021

Stan and Francine go back in time to settle an argument.

The Wondercabinet

S 18 Ep 6

7.1

24th May 2021

Steve spins out about his future, but a radio show about new age mysticism gives him a hopeful new understanding of life. Roger struggles to get into the adult film industry.

Mean Francine

S 15 Ep 13

7.1

7th May 2018

Francine falls in with a group of tough girls after becoming the new school guidance counselor. Jeff panics when he loses his hat.

Saving Face

S 20 Ep 9

7.1

29th May 2023

In an attempt to maintain his "prime," Stan explores some cosmetic solutions that could not go worse.

The Legend of Old Ulysses

S 15 Ep 17

7.1

4th Mar 2019

Steve gets competitive during the father-son events at Possum Lake. Roger learns how to ride a bike.

The Professor and the Coach

S 20 Ep 2

7.1

3rd Apr 2023

Hayley tries to help Roger write a book.

The Pink Sphinx Holds Her Hearts on the Turn

S 20 Ep 20

7.1

4th Dec 2023

Francine enters the strange and dangerous world of poker in order to learn how to hide her true feelings from Steve and Hayley.

Hayley Was a Girl Scout?

S 19 Ep 17

7.1

14th Nov 2022

Stan is forced to co-lead a scouts troop with Hayley while Steve blunders in his fantasy world.

Dancin' A-With My Cells

S 18 Ep 8

7.1

7th Jun 2021

Stan tries a new, cutting edge parenting approach DNA splicing.

Businessly Brunette

S 17 Ep 19

7.1

17th Aug 2020

Hayley takes off her headband and becomes a businesswoman; Stan plans a party.

The Fast and the Spurious

S 19 Ep 13

7.1

3rd Oct 2022

Roger is forced to confront himself after a series of accidents. Klaus and Jeff bond.

One-Woman Swole

S 15 Ep 14

7.1

11th Feb 2019

After her family accuses her of being a quitter, Francine becomes a bodybuilder. Klaus claims to have invented the high five.

100 Years a Solid Fool

S 17 Ep 1

7.2

13th Apr 2020

While running an errand in Little Columbia, Stan is confronted by his hidden past.

Demolition Daddy

S 16 Ep 15

7.2

22nd Jul 2019

Thanks to Roger, Snot discovers his dead father was a demolition derby driver. Hayley takes Steve on a road trip, so he can learn to drive.

The Hall Monitor and the Lunch Lady

S 16 Ep 9

7.2

10th Jun 2019

Steve goes undercover as a school hall monitor; Roger and Stan go catatonic after witnessing a grisly escalator accident.

Who Smarted?

S 18 Ep 1

7.2

19th Apr 2021

Worried that he's not smart enough for Hayley, Jeff undergoes an experimental intelligence enhancement procedure at the CIA. Roger recruits Steve to help him harvest snake venom.

A Starboy Is Born

S 17 Ep 4

7.2

4th May 2020

Roger tries to give Steve bubonic plague in order to qualify to Make-A-Wish to meet The Weeknd. Stan abducts The Weeknd to teach Roger a valuable lesson. Meanwhile, Hayley attempts to sleep with the celebrity singer.

Little Bonnie Ramirez

S 18 Ep 7

7.2

31st May 2021

After a series of boring personas, Roger goes to great lengths to prove to Francine he still has "his edge".

Paranoid_Frandroid

S 15 Ep 2

7.2

12th Feb 2018

Francine becomes a conspiracy theorist when she finds out Stan has been shielding her from unhappy news; Klaus and Steve help Snot pimp out his basement.

Lumberjerk

S 18 Ep 12

7.2

5th Jul 2021

Stan is forced to partner with Jeff in a lumberjack competition; Steve, Francine and Snot enter a contest to win a vintage pickup truck.

Death By Dinner Party

S 15 Ep 8

7.2

26th Mar 2018

Francine hosts a dinner party even though a serial killer who attacks dinner parties is terrorizing the town; when the lights go out and guests start to disappear, Roger takes charge of solving the mystery of who is stalking the party.

Hamerican Dad!

S 16 Ep 14

7.2

15th Jul 2019

Stan, reluctantly invites Roger into his ham club. Francine decides to scare Greg.

Twinanigans

S 15 Ep 18

7.2

11th Mar 2019

Steve and Roger restart their career as a twin brother acting duo. The family becomes addicted to a novelty gift shop.

The Bitchin' Race

S 14 Ep 16

7.2

31st Jul 2017

The family competes on the reality show, The Bitchin' Race but after Stan and Hayley ditch the less-motivated Steve and Francine to team up, they end up in a Tunisian labor prison.

Independent Movie

S 10 Ep 6

7.2

1st Dec 2013

Determined to get Snot to confront his emotions after his father passes away, Steve and friends embark on an epic cross-country road trip to the funeral. But Steve's commitment to his friend wavers when he falls for a Pixie Dream Girl along the way. Meanwhile, Stan and Roger invent an automatic cake-cutter for the Home Shopping Network, but their partnership is tested when they only make a "verbal agreement" to split the profits.

Into the Woods

S 17 Ep 7

7.2

25th May 2020

When Stan sees a middle-school classmate, he feels compelled to right an old wrong; Roger feels a cold coming on.

A Star is Reborn

S 12 Ep 10

7.2

16th Mar 2015

While on vacation in Los Angeles, Stan joins the world of old Hollywood. Meanwhile, Roger kennel-trains Steve and Hayley.

I Heard You Wanna Buy Some Speakers

S 19 Ep 16

7.2

7th Nov 2022

Barry blows out his dad's speakers and Snot helps him replace them. Stan attempts to do a standing backflip.

Wild Women Do

S 16 Ep 10

7.2

17th Jun 2019

Jeff is forced to take Francine out for a not-so-wild night on the town. Klaus forces Steve to watch his celebrity impressions.

Men II Boyz

S 17 Ep 15

7.2

20th Jul 2020

Klaus enlists Stan, Roger and Jeff to join him on a wild bachelor party weekend.

Please Please Jeff

S 19 Ep 18

7.2

21st Nov 2022

Jeff's people pleasing nature gets in the way of his relationship with Hayley; Stan wears a confusing costume to the CIA costume party.

Exquisite Corpses

S 17 Ep 9

7.2

8th Jun 2020

Jeff, Francine and Roger decide to team up and start their own bus tour business, with murderous results.

Persona Assistant

S 15 Ep 16

7.2

25th Feb 2019

Stan has to take over Roger’s different personas after a tumor takes him out of commission. Principal Lewis pressures Steve and the school choir to do whatever it takes to win.

Brave N00b World

S 17 Ep 6

7.3

18th May 2020

Stan and Steve enter an e-sports game tournament to save the world. The rest of the family get stuck in a banister.

Lost Boys

S 16 Ep 6

7.3

20th May 2019

Roger breaks up Steve's friendship with Snot, Barry and Toshi. Jeff realizes he has a flair for house flipping and gets Stan, Francine and Hayley involved.

Blood Crieth Unto Heaven

S 9 Ep 10

7.3

27th Jan 2013

When Francine invites Stan's father to a party, a dark secret about the Smith family's past is revealed.

The Old Country

S 17 Ep 18

7.3

10th Aug 2020

Steve wants to know about the Smith Family heritage, but Stan refuses to indulge him. Stan is obsessed with being American and tells Steve that being American is all that matters. Steve steals Stan's DNA for an at-home DNA test and discovers that they are Canadian. Steve rejoices in finally knowing his heritage, but the news devastates Stan.

Kloger

S 14 Ep 19

7.3

21st Aug 2017

Roger and Klaus start having a secret affair after they accidentally end up on an online date together. Meanwhile, Steve tries to catch Hayley's pink eye to get out of doing a fitness test at school.

I Am The Jeans: The Gina Lavetti Story

S 16 Ep 2

7.3

22nd Apr 2019

Francine tries to be a better friend to one of Roger's personas who is selling her homemade jeans on TV. Stan and Steve swap eyebrows.

Shell Game

S 15 Ep 4

7.3

26th Feb 2018

Steve tries to stop Roger after he joins a mysterious order of birds' egg thieves; Francine buys a new Italian sauce for the family.

Kung Pao Turkey

S 10 Ep 5

7.3

24th Nov 2013

Stan's plans for a perfect Thanksgiving watching football in his underwear are thwarted when Francine invites her adoptive parents to join them for the holiday.

Minstrel Krampus

S 10 Ep 8

7.3

15th Dec 2013

When Steve starts acting like a spoiled brat during the holidays, Stan takes him to see his incarcerated Grandpa Jack, who tells him the story of how he caught Minstrel Krampus, a legendary demon who punishes naughty children on Christmas. Stan decides that releasing Krampus is the only way to straighten out Steve's attitude. But when Krampus kidnaps Steve, it's up to Stan and Roger to get him back. Meanwhile, Hayley gets a job at the airport, but quickly realizes that she might not be cut out for customer service.

Game Night

S 17 Ep 11

7.3

22nd Jun 2020

Stan drags the family to a labyrinth for family game night; Roger gets some geese.

An Irish Goodbye

S 16 Ep 11

7.3

24th Jun 2019

Francine helps Hayley take a break from their marriages. Stan and Jeff pretend to be frontiersmen.

Garbage Stan

S 14 Ep 20

7.3

28th Aug 2017

Stan and Steve open up their own father-son garbage business after Stan inherits his father's old truck. Meanwhile, Roger finds Hayley is a natural at bumper pool and brings her to play with the best player in town.

First, Do No Farm

S 17 Ep 16

7.3

27th Jul 2020

Concerned that Hayley is too soft-hearted, Stan attempts to make her "farm tough" by turning the house into an urban homestead.

Footprints

S 20 Ep 18

7.3

20th Nov 2023

Stan and Roger go on a mission to leave their mark on humanity. Jeff finally deals with the reality of losing his signature hat.

The Nova Centauris-Burgh Board Of Tourism Presents: American Dad

S 13 Ep 14

7.3

2nd May 2016

Francine joins in on Steve and his pals' live-action role-playing game. Stan opens a knock-off Seaworld in the house.

Smooshed: A Love Story

S 19 Ep 12

7.3

26th Sep 2022

Steve goes on a class trip to Philadelphia, where he hopes to fall in love.

Santa, Schmanta

S 15 Ep 1

7.3

25th Dec 2017

Roger turns his attention to Steve's friend Snot who teaches him about Hanukkah, prompting him to convert to Judaism. Roger then decides to make Hanukkah more popular than Christmas by stealing Santa's powers, and becoming Schmanta Claus.

Frantastic Voyage

S 20 Ep 10

7.3

4th Sep 2023

When Stan goes too far to keep his work friend away from Francine, she is forced to save her new "little" friend.

Fleabiscuit

S 15 Ep 21

7.3

1st Apr 2019

Hayley feels left behind after Jeff becomes a star dog racing coach; Steve takes advantage of an empty house.

Widow's Pique

S 13 Ep 13

7.3

25th Apr 2016

When Stan is on a mission, Francine pretends she's a widow. Steve and his friends play wrestling and get beat up by Principal Lewis.

Stan-Dan Deliver

S 13 Ep 8

7.3

14th Mar 2016

Roger becomes a teacher at Steve's school and gets involved with a class of underprivileged kids. Meanwhile, Stan and Francine visit a retirement home and Stan decides to stay.

Stompe Le Monde

S 16 Ep 12

7.3

1st Jul 2019

Stan buys the rights a Broadway show after inheriting money from a dead uncle.

Funnyish Games

S 15 Ep 20

7.3

25th Mar 2019

Francine becomes obsessed with home security after a break-in rattles her. Steve tries on Hayley's laidback approach to school work.

The Curious Case of the Old Hole

S 19 Ep 9

7.3

5th Sep 2022

Wheels and the Legman try to hunt down the perpetrators who destroyed Steve's secret swimming hole. Meanwhile, Klaus helps an aging Principal Lewis reclaim his confidence.

The Future Is Borax

S 15 Ep 22

7.3

8th Apr 2019

Worried about their bickering, Stan and Francine go to extremes to save their marriage. Roger excels at jingle writing.

Seizures Suit Stanny

S 12 Ep 15

7.3

1st Jun 2015

When Stan lies about his texting-and-driving accident, he takes a seizure medication and suffers from the side effects. Meanwhile, Roger helps Steve with his performance anxiety.

Father's Daze

S 14 Ep 1

7.3

7th Nov 2016

Stan can't escape a recurring Father's Day.
